page.title: 02OLD PEOPLE'S CLUB
page.content: The leader of Spaldwick's Derby & Joan Club is Mrs B. Croft.The previous leader was Mrs V.Brown who was leader for 25 years.In the club there are about 30 members and they go on approximately 2 coach trips a year.For the trips,they go to places like historic houses and shopping centres. At club meetings,they play dominoes, whist and drink tea.They meet about once a month.The average age in the club is 68-70.The club is not really involved with the church,although many individual members and helpers are. In Ellington there is a similar kind of club for the elderly,which is called the Over 60's club.The club meetings are held in the Ellington Village Hall,and the leader is Mrs E.Bird.
